ÓÑÅ
 

Major Incident Resolved : www.faces.ae <https://www.faces.ae/>  is down

______________________________________________________________________________

______________________________________________________________________________

Date: 08 Feb, 25

Time: 11:30 AM GST

 

Dear Colleagues,

 

The issue affecting www.faces.ae <http://www.faces.ae>  has been resolved, and the website is now fully accessible.

 
All other services, including the mobile app and other Faces sites, remain fully operational.
 If you require any further assistance, please raise a support ticket via the following link: OneReach Support Portal <https://onereach.chalhoub.com/> . 
Alternatively, you can contact us via WhatsApp at +971 48045755 or use the chatbot available on the support portal.
 
Thank you for your patience and cooperation.
